{{Disambig}}

'''Swamp''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{BiomeLink|Swamp}} – a wetland [[biome]] characterized by shallow pools, gray-green [[water]], and patches of [[lily pads]], [[dead bushes]], [[firefly bushes]], and [[blue orchids]].
* {{BiomeLink|Mangrove Swamp}} – a variant of the swamp biome, mangrove swamps are filled with [[mud]] and dense [[mangrove trees]], as well as green-blue water. They also include many features from the swamp biome.
* {{EnvLink|Swamp Hut}} – also known as '''witch huts''', these small [[structures]] can spawn in the swamp biome and have the ability to spawn [[witches]] and [[black cat]]s.
* {{EnvLink|Swamp Oak}} a variant of the [[oak tree]] that spawns in swamps.
* {{EnvLink|Mangrove}} a tree that spawns in mangrove swamps.
* {{BiomeLink|Swamp Hills}} – a hilly variant of the swamp biome that was removed in the [[Caves & Cliffs]] update.
